mapper.select: SELECT id AS enterprise_id, enterprise_name, shop_user_name, legal_person_name, legal_person_idcard as legal_person_idcard, contact1_position, contact1_name, contact1_phone, social_credit_no, biz_licence_url, shop_id, contact1_name FROM diyi_enterprise t1 WHERE bool_deleted = 0 AND enterprise_name = #{param1}

SELECT enterprise_name, legal_person_name, contact1_mail, contact1_phone, working_address, social_credit_no, biz_licence_url, create_time, enterprise_state FROM diyi_enterprise t1 WHERE bool_deleted = 0 AND id = #{param1}

SELECT t1.id, t1.enterprise_name, IF((SELECT COUNT(id) FROM diyi_agreement WHERE bool_deleted = 0 AND agreement_type = 'ENTERPRISEJOINAGREEMENT' AND valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND party_b = 'ENTERPRISEPEOPLE' AND party_b_id = t1.id) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) AS bool_join_contract, IF((SELECT COUNT(id) FROM diyi_agreement WHERE bool_deleted = 0 AND agreement_type = 'ENTERPRISEPROMISE' AND valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND party_b = 'ENTERPRISEPEOPLE' AND party_b_id = t1.id) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) AS bool_commitment_letter FROM diyi_enterprise t1 WHERE t1.bool_deleted = 0
AND t1.enterprise_name LIKE concat('%', #{param1}, '%')

SELECT t1.id, t1.enterprise_name, t1.contact1_name, t1.contact1_phone, t1.enterprise_state, t1.create_time, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(agreement_url) FROM diyi_agreement WHERE bool_deleted = 0 AND agreement_type = 'ENTERPRISEJOINAGREEMENT' AND valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND party_b = 'ENTERPRISEPEOPLE' AND party_b_id = t1.id) AS join_contract, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(agreement_url) FROM diyi_agreement WHERE bool_deleted = 0 AND agreement_type = 'ENTERPRISEPROMISE' AND valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND party_b = 'ENTERPRISEPEOPLE' AND party_b_id = t1.id) AS commitment_letters FROM diyi_enterprise t1
INNER JOIN diyi_agent_main_enterprise t2 ON t1.id = t2.enterprise_id AND t2.bool_deleted = 0 AND t2.cooperate_status = 'COOPERATING' AND t2.agent_main_id = #{param1}
INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise_service_provider t3 ON t1.id = t3.enterprise_id AND t3.bool_deleted = 0 AND t3.cooperate_status = 'COOPERATING' INNER JOIN diyi_rel_bureau_service_provider t4 ON t3.service_provider_id = t4.service_provider_id AND t4.bool_deleted = 0 AND t4.cooperate_status = 'COOPERATING' AND t4.rel_bureau_id = #{param2}
WHERE t1.bool_deleted = 0
AND t1.enterprise_name LIKE concat('%', #{param3.enterpriseName}, '%')
AND DATEDIFF(t1.create_time, #{param3.beginDate}) >= 0
AND DATEDIFF(t1.create_time, #{param3.endDate}) <= 0

SELECT t1.id, t1.enterprise_name, t1.legal_person_name, t1.legal_person_idcard, t1.social_credit_no, t1.biz_licence_url, t1.enterprise_url, t1.contact1_name, t1.contact1_position, t1.contact1_phone, t1.contact1_mail, t1.contact2_name, t1.contact2_position, t1.contact2_phone, t1.contact2_mail, t1.invoice_enterprise_name, t1.invoice_tax_no, t1.invoice_address_phone, t1.invoice_bank_name_account, t2.employee_user_name, t2.phone_number, t2.worker_name, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(agreement_url) FROM diyi_agreement WHERE bool_deleted = 0 AND agreement_type = 'ENTERPRISEJOINAGREEMENT' AND valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND party_b = 'ENTERPRISEPEOPLE' AND party_b_id = t1.id) AS join_contract, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(agreement_url) FROM diyi_agreement WHERE bool_deleted = 0 AND agreement_type = 'ENTERPRISEPROMISE' AND valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND party_b = 'ENTERPRISEPEOPLE' AND party_b_id = t1.id) AS commitment_letters FROM diyi_enterprise t1 INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise_worker t2 ON t1.id = t2.enterprise_id WHERE t1.bool_deleted = 0 AND t2.bool_deleted = 0 AND t2.up_level_id IS NULL AND t1.id = #{param1}

SELECT contact1_name, contact1_position, contact1_phone, contact1_mail, contact2_name, contact2_position, contact2_phone, contact2_mail FROM diyi_enterprise WHERE bool_deleted = 0 AND id = #{param1}

INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise_service_provider t2 ON t1.id = t2.enterprise_id

WHERE t1.bool_deleted = 0
